scripts.android: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.build:apk: npm run android && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug && node -e "const pkg = require('../package.json'); const fs = require('fs'); fs.readdirSync('.').forEach(f => { if (f.startsWith('Soonish-') && f.endsWith('.apk')) { fs.unlinkSync(f); console.log('Deleted ' + f); } }); const dest = 'Soonish-v' + pkg.version + '.apk'; fs.copyFileSync('app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk', dest); console.log('Copied to ' + dest);"
